entry.title: Bioinformatic processing of microbiome (16s rRNA gene) sequencing data - QIIME 1.8.0

link.title: Bioinformatic processing of microbiome (16s rRNA gene) sequencing data - QIIME 1.8.0

entry.content: The first step in this pipeline is to join forward and reverse reads using PANDAseq. Then format the joined sequence files through by adding QIIME headers with the respective sample ID to each sequence before concatenating into one file for input into QIIME 1.8.0. Operational taxonomic units (OTUs) will be picked using the QIIME pick_closed_reference_otus.py script with a threshold of 97% identity to the Greengenes database. The Shannon alpha diversity will be calculated on the unfiltered biom table using the alpha_diversity.py script, and weighted UniFrac distances are calculated with the beta_diversity.py script. | QIIME1 |
entry.summary: The first step in this pipeline is to join forward and reverse reads using PANDAseq. Then format the joined sequence files through by adding QIIME headers with the respective sample ID to each sequence before concatenating into one file for input into QIIME 1.8.0. Operational taxonomic units (OTUs) will be picked using the QIIME pick_closed_reference_otus.py script with a threshold of 97% identity to the Greengenes database. The Shannon alpha diversity will be calculated on the unfiltered biom table using the alpha_diversity.py script, and weighted UniFrac distances are calculated with the beta_diversity.py script. | QIIME1 |

entry.title: NGS based detection of copy number variations (CNVs).

link.title: NGS based detection of copy number variations (CNVs).

entry.content: CNVs represent gain or loss of genomic regions. CNVs transmit from parents to offspring or arise de novo and play important role in neuro-psychiatric disorders and cancers. Traditionally CNVs are identified through array based approaches but recent advances in genomic technologies, whole genome sequencing (WGS) approaches are becaming popular. Existing NGS-based approaches, which detect CNVs for individual sample level, usually yield low-detection accuracy, while joint modeling approaches use maximum advantage of Mendelian transmission within the parent-offspring trio improved CNV detection accuracy. | BWA MEM | CNAVnator | Pindel | SVseq2 | TrioCNV |

Traditionally CNVs are identified through array based approaches but recent advances in genomic technologies, whole genome sequencing (WGS) approaches are becaming popular.
